greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A262697(n^2).
comment: a(n)=0 if n^2 is in A259934, otherwise number of nodes in that finite subtree whose root is n^2 and edge-relation is defined by A049820(child) = parent. This count includes also leaves and n^2 itself.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..222
xref: Cf. A262515 (positions of zeros), A263093 (positions of ones).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 12 2015
